resources.string: (Tap on the animal image to open the gallery)
Animals that eat fruits such as mango, jackfruit, durian and lychee. In addition, the Sumatran Orangutan also eats eggs and small vertebrates.
Makinobu is a member of the ape family. The population is 6,700â€“17,300 individuals (IUCN, 2006). The current status of the Sisiobu is as a rare animal.

Yaki or wolai monkeys or Sulawesi black monkeys (Macaca nigra) / red-rumped monkeys are endemic to Indonesia which are only found on the northern part of Sulawesi Island and several surrounding islands, namely in the Tangkoko Bitung Forest.
Proboscis monkeys are monkeys that have long noses and animals that eat seeds and fruits. It can also eat leaves which can produce gas when digested.
Local people call it Bokoi or bokkoi (Macaca pagensis). They are a type of monkey that is limited (endemic) to the Mentawai Islands, off the west coast of Sumatra.

The black eagle is a species of eagle with great defensive power and is spread over various areas at an altitude of three hundred to two thousand meters above sea level. The special characteristics of the black eagle are seen from its wings that appear to be fingered, wide and strong.
Sumatra, Kalimantan, Java, Bali and Nusa Tenggara
The brontok eagle is a type of bird of prey belonging to the Accipitridae tribe. It is so named possibly because of its speckled color (in light-colored forms).
The Javan eagle lives in the inland and secondary zones at an altitude of 3 hundred above sea level.
Also known as the Crested Serpent Eagle or CSE by some bird of prey (BOP) lovers
The short fingered snake eagle is a large animal with a dimension of 65 centimeters. His body is mighty with a white fur color. The animal is very rarely seen.
Judging from its appearance alone, this one shark already looks terrible. How not, he has horns on his forehead, unlike sharks in general.
coastal waters throughout the main ocean surface

The Great White Shark is the largest flesh-eating shark in the world. The females can grow up to six meters, while the male sharks can grow up to four meters. They can be found throughout the oceans, but mostly occupy warm areas.
Bull sharks have a relatively small body, ranging from two to three meters. But don\'t underestimate them. The bull shark is often referred to as the most dangerous shark in the world.
Tiger sharks have a reputation for being man-eaters. They are the second most dangerous shark after the bull shark. Its body is quite large because it can grow up to five meters long.
Indian Ocean south of Java and Nusa Tenggara.
The hammerhead shark is famous for its unique head shape. They are also quite large because they can grow up to six meters long.
